title: TIP2 - Base LON mining power for every trade (交易获得 LON 挖矿基础算力)
body:
Background
* According to the current LON mining rules, users need to incur a net fee/net contribution to obtain LON. Due to the Ethereum miner fee, it is difficult for small trades to generate a net contribution. Thus many users who only make small trades cannot obtain LON.

Goal
* Allow users who trade in small amounts to obtain LON, thereby enjoying fee discounts by holding LON, and gaining the right to participate in community governance.

Proposed Action Items
* Add rule: A trader will receive a base LON mining power for every trade, base power = gas fee in USD * 0.1
  * Example: If you make a trade and paid $2 in USD for gas fee, you will receive 0.2 base power for LON mining.
* Implement it to take effect in the second phase of LON mining.

----------

背景
* 根据目前的 LON 挖矿规则，用户需产生净贡献才能获得 LON。由于以太坊矿工费，导致小额交易用户较难产生净贡献，因而无法获得 LON。

目的
* 使小额交易用户也能够获得 LON，从而通过持有 LON 享受费率折扣，并获得参与社区治理的权利。

提案执行项
* 添加规则：在 Tokenlon 进行交易即可获得基础算力，基础算力 = 交易矿工费（以美元计）* 0.1
  * 例如：你做了一笔交易，并支付了 2 美元矿工费 ，那么你将可以获得 0.2 基础算力
* 在 LON 挖矿第二阶段中实施生效
